name: auto-news-grabber
description: Daily auto news scraping, translation to Ukrainian, and React viewer

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:viewer
scripts.scrape: npm run build:backend --silent && node dist/scrape_news.js --config backend/sources.json --output data/news.json --target-language uk --verbose
scripts.backfill:photos: npm run build:backend --silent && node dist/backfill_missing_photos.js --output data/news.json --latest-run data/latest_run.json --verbose
scripts.supabase:sync: npm run build:backend --silent && node dist/sync_to_supabase.js --scope latest-run
scripts.supabase:sync:snapshot: npm run build:backend --silent && node dist/sync_to_supabase.js --scope snapshot
scripts.scrape:no-translate: npm run build:backend --silent && node dist/scrape_news.js --config backend/sources.json --output data/news.json --target-language uk --disable-translation --verbose
scripts.viewer:dev: npm run build --silent && concurrently -k -n backend,viewer,server -c yellow,cyan,green "npm:build:backend:watch" "npm:build:viewer:watch" "npm:start:watch"
